name: Web To Print Shop : uDraw – Widescreen UI
author: Racad Tech, Inc.

sections.description: The uDraw Designer Widescreen UI plugin is an extension plugin of Web To Print Shop: uDraw. This plugin allows the user to customize and use a different Designer skin of their own design, than the standard ones bundled in the main plugin. A PDF file is also included for those interested in making their own custom UI. For an online version, please visit https://racadtech.atlassian.net/wiki/display/UDUI/uDraw+Designer+UI. We will update as we add more features to the uDraw Designer. The uDRAW HTML 5 canvas designer and product personalizer can be obtained via Web to Print Solutions, WebtoPrintShop.com, uDRAW.net and OnlineSignStudio.com
sections.installation:
Requires
Plugin: Web To Print Shop: uDraw

  1. Unzip and upload contents of the plugin to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Set this UI as your default UI by selecting it in W2P:uDraw > Settings > Designer UI.
sections.changelog:
1.3.0

  • Fixed bug when sending object forward / backwards
  • Added colour wheel icon for colour picker
  • Fixed woocommerce warnings

1.2.0

  • Added missing buttons for uDraw
  • Updated UI

1.1.0

  • Updated number of parameters needed in the filter “udraw_designer_ui_override”, and added the missing parameter in the linked function
  • Fixed up UI
  • Calling include_once on multi-udraw-templates.php
  • Updated PDF with new changes

1.0.0

  • Initial Release to WordPress
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Requires
Plugin: Web To Print Shop: uDraw

  1. Unzip and upload contents of the plugin to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Set this UI as your default UI by selecting it in W2P:uDraw > Settings > Designer UI.
